home.description: This portfolio documents my internship journey as part of the Programming Graduate program at AP Hogeschool. Here, I share my experiences, learnings, and growth throughout my workplace learning period.

about.title: Web Developer in Training
about.educationText: I'm currently studying Programming at AP Hogeschool, learning both frontend and backend development. While I enjoy the logic of backend work, I'm also working on improving my frontend skills to build complete applications from start to finish.
about.languagesText: Native Spanish speaker, fluent in Dutch, and comfortable working in English. This helps me work well in diverse teams and understand technical resources in multiple languages.
about.aiPhilosophyText: I see AI as a helpful partner in coding - great for suggesting improvements and catching mistakes, while I keep full control and understanding of my projects.
about.aiApproachText: I mainly use AI for: Getting code suggestions, improving existing solutions, and writing documentation. I'm careful never to share private code or data with AI tools.
about.aiExample: While building this portfolio, I used AI for layout ideas and troubleshooting, but every decision and line of code is my own.
